name: Genetic Foresight
description: Developing a Laravel based application to help clinicians prescribe personalized medication to patients.
Working on frontend with JavaScript, Bootstrap, jQuery and maintaining MySQL database.
Deploying and managing applications on AWS Elastic Beanstalk and RDS.

name: GoFind.ai
description: Built an Image Search Engine for shopping using Machine Learning and Computer Vision.
Performed analysis on Convolutional Neural Networks and Multi-Object Recognition algorithm.
Successfully implemented the algorithms with TensorFlow, Darknet, OpenCV using C++/C and Python and achieved an accuracy of 90%.
